description: Used to create a custom domain name for a cluster. Properties include the custom domain name, the cluster the custom domain is associated with, and the certificate Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: CustomDomainName
parameters.description: The custom domain name for a custom domain association.

parameters.name: CustomDomainCertificateArn
parameters.description: The certificate Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the custom domain name association.

parameters.name: ClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The cluster identifier that the custom domain is associated with.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name for the association result.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the certificate associated with the custom domain name.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster that the custom domain is associated with.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainCertExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The expiration time for the certificate for the custom domain.
